description: Try our easy to follow Chat Potatoes with Rosemary & Garlic recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chat Potatoes with Rosemary & Garlic Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve chat potatoes, using a small knife, cut a slit into the rounded top of each potato. Insert a slice of garlic and a small sprig of rosemary. Place into a roasting pan, drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 40 minutes until golden and crisp.
